comments.author: george.carstoiu@gmail.com
comments.text:
Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10.6; rv:6.0a2) Gecko/20110606 Firefox/6.0a2

After changing channel to Beta, the name present in the Dock and the Finder remains Aurora.

Reproducible: always

Steps to reproduce:
 1. Open latest Aurora build
 2. In the about page dialog window change channel to Beta
 3. Wait for download to finish and apply update
 4. Inspect dock tooltip and application name in Finder

Actual results:
 - although Firefox Beta in installed, Aurora name present

Expected results:
 - names should change to Beta
comments.creator: george.carstoiu@gmail.com
comments.raw_text:
Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10.6; rv:6.0a2) Gecko/20110606 Firefox/6.0a2

After changing channel to Beta, the name present in the Dock and the Finder remains Aurora.

Reproducible: always

Steps to reproduce:
 1. Open latest Aurora build
 2. In the about page dialog window change channel to Beta
 3. Wait for download to finish and apply update
 4. Inspect dock tooltip and application name in Finder

Actual results:
 - although Firefox Beta in installed, Aurora name present

Expected results:
 - names should change to Beta
This sounds similar to bug 658690. However, because the channel switcher was removed in bug 659972, so this won't be a problem anymore.
comments.creator: margaret.leibovic@gmail.com
